Class BroadcasterCacheBase

java.lang.Object
  org.atmosphere.cache.BroadcasterCacheBase
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
SessionBroadcasterCache
public abstract class BroadcasterCacheBase
extends Object
implements BroadcasterCache<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest,javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse>

Abstract BroadcasterCache which is used to implement headers or query parameters or session based caching.

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand
